entry.data:
SNOW
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 3 INCHES
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 11
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW

SNOW, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE MORNING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 6 TO 10 INCHES
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 12
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLDER WITH LOWS AROUND 4 BELOW
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 12 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS AROUND 20
